overview:
Daniel R. Rosen is a personal injury and auto accident lawyer in Denver, Colorado with three decades of experience.

He personally handles every single case that comes across his desk, and has settled over $100 million in cases for his clients. The Law Offices of Daniel R. Rosen are located in Denver, Colorado Springs, Englewood, and Greeley. His expertise includes personal injury, car accidents, motorcycle accidents, and wrongful death cases, among others.
